snippet: Atlético Madrid stayed on course for its first Spanish league title in 18 years with a 2-0 win over visiting Elche.
abstract: Atletico Madrid beats Elche, 2-0, remaining on course for its first Spanish league title in 18 years.
lead_paragraph: Atlético Madrid stayed on course for its first Spanish league title in 18 years with a 2-0 win over visiting Elche.

headline.main: Atlético Madrid Closing In on Title
headline.print_headline: Atlético Madrid Closing In on Title
